page.title: 03The Community Policeman
page.content:
The{Police Service}in Cornwall is divided into three tiers:
{ 1.}The Community Policeman { 2.}The Response Section (Panda Patrols, etc.) { 3.}The Specialist Departments (C.I.D. Mobile Policing, Dog, Underwater Search, Helicopter and Administration Section)
{The job of the Community Policeman}is to patrol his area and to liaise with members of the public. His tasks also include visiting schools and meeting children, fostering a good relation- ship with them. The final result being that children reach adulthood as responsible citizens. Complaints to the police are investigated by him and he has all the backup services of the {Specialist Departments}to use.
